text: A Friend of the Deceased () is a 1997 French Ukrainian drama movie directed by Viacheslav Kryshtofovych and starring Aleksandr Lazarev Jr., Anzhelika Nevolina, Elena Korikova, Tetiana Kryvytska Stang Lund, Yevheniy Pashin, Serhiy Romaniuk, Anatoliy Mateshko, Rostislav Yankovsky. == Other websites == * Category:1997 drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Ukrainian movies Category:Movies directed by Viacheslav Kryshtofovych
title: A Friend of the Deceased
